uts.wsd.teamtwo.soap

Class ReviewSOAP

  • java.lang.Object
    • uts.wsd.teamtwo.soap.ReviewSOAP

  • public class ReviewSOAP
extends java.lang.Object
    The SOAP Service which exposes functionality for retrieving and manipulating Reviews on the database.
    Author:
    Deinyon L Davies

      • getAuthorApp

        Returns:
        the Author Data Access Object

      • fetchReviews

        public Reviews fetchReviews()
        Returns:
        The entire (unfiltered) collection of reviews from the database

      • postReview

        public ReviewSOAPResult postReview(Review review,
                          java.lang.String username,
                          java.lang.String password)
        Appends a given review to the database. The review does not need to specify an ID number, author ID number or date, for they will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        review - The review to append to the database
        username - The username of the author who is posting the review
        password - THe password of the author who is posting the review
        Returns:
        The result of the review addition.
        See Also:
        ReviewSOAPResult, Review

      • deleteReview

        public ReviewSOAPResult deleteReview(Review review,
                            java.lang.String username,
                            java.lang.String password)
        Removes a given review from the database
        Parameters:
        review - The review to remove from the database
        username - The username of the author who is deleting the review
        password - THe password of the author who is deleting the review
        Returns:
        The result of the review deletion.
        See Also:
        ReviewSOAPResult, Review
